body: More than simple clothing, padded armor combines heavy, quilted cloth and layers of densely packed stuffing to create a cheap and basic protection. It is typically worn by those not intending to face lethal combat or those who wish their maneuverability to be impacted as little as possible.
name: Padded
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Armor/Armor and Shields/Padded
